db:abstract.db:para: The QRenderStateSet FrameGraph node offers a way of specifying a set of QRenderState objects to be applied during the execution of a framegraph branch.
This class was introduced in Qt 5.5.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: States set on a QRenderStateSet are set globally, contrary to the per-material states that can be set on a QRenderPass. By default, an empty QRenderStateSet will result in all render states being disabled when executed. Adding a QRenderState state explicitly enables that render state at runtime.

db:section.db:title: void QRenderStateSet::addRenderState(Qt3DRender::QRenderState *state)
db:section.db:para: Adds a new QRenderState state to the QRenderStateSet instance.

db:note.db:para: Not setting any QRenderState state on a QRenderStateSet instance implies all the render states will be disabled at render time.

db:section.db:title: void QRenderStateSet::removeRenderState(Qt3DRender::QRenderState *state)
db:section.db:para: Removes the QRenderState state from the QRenderStateSet instance.

db:section.db:title: QVector<Qt3DRender::QRenderState *> QRenderStateSet::renderStates() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the list of QRenderState objects that compose the QRenderStateSet instance.
